thread.title: Rape film banned in India gets Meryl Streep's backing for Oscar
thread.title_full: Rape film banned in India gets Meryl Streep's backing for Oscar - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Rape film banned in India gets Meryl Streep's backing for Oscar
text: NEW YORK (Thomson Reuters Foundation) - A film banned by Indian authorities about the deadly rape of a young woman on a bus in New Delhi has opened in the United States to acclaim, with Hollywood star Meryl Streep saying it deserves to win an Academy Award. Â»
